pkgmetadata.longdescription: MobileU MOOC============The MobileU MVP framework allows other developers to easily build mobileeducation sites.|mobileu-ci|_Installation~~~~~~~~~~~~:: $ virtualenv ve $ source ve/bin/activate (ve)$ pip install -r requirements.txtRun Tests~~~~~~~~~:: $ source ve/bin/activate (ve)$ python manage.py test.. |mobileu-ci| image:: https://travis-ci.org/praekelt/mobileu.svg?branch=develop.. _mobileu-ci: https://travis-ci.org/praekelt/mobileu
